WeaponMaster:SwordLevel.NAME: Sword Lvl
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with Strength equal to Sword level.

WeaponMaster:ShieldLevel.NAME: Shield Lvl
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with Dexterity equal to Shield level.

WeaponMaster:PlayerEquipment.NAME: Equipment Lvl
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with Strength and Dexterity equal to Equipment level.
